QuestData.Title: A Tangled Web
QuestData.Description: We have had a disturbing report from the Anglers fishermen of Sri-La Village, $n.$B$BMany of their villagers are missing, taken by the spiders who live in The Widow's Wail, a cave along the coast to the north.$B$BThe victims are dragged into the dark depths, wrapped in cocoons, and left to become the spiders' next meal.$B$BWe believe that some of the people may still be alive. There is still time to save them! I need you to go and rescue as many villagers as you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Widow's Webs to free 5 Sri-La Villagers.
